description.text: Stay tuned for our upcoming milestones and achievements

milestones.title: Foundation
milestones.description: Establishment of Innovation Lab with a vision to foster technological advancement and research excellence.

milestones.title: IIC Quest
milestones.description: IIC Quest 1.0 was a four-day pioneering initiative that brought together industry experts, students, and faculty members from both BIT and BBA programs. The event featured a comprehensive journey from bootcamp to pitch-day hackathon, with insightful sessions and seminars led by industry leaders.

milestones.title: IIC Quest 2.0
milestones.description: IIC Quest 2.0 was a three-day program featuring a 36-hour intensive hackathon with participation from various colleges across the Purwanchal region of Nepal. The event also included a Job Fair, where more than ten renowned companies from across Nepal sought to recruit talented students and graduates, and a Final Year Project Showcase, providing students with the opportunity to present their projects to potential employers.

milestones.title: Creative Clash 2025
milestones.description: Creative Clash 2025: The Triathon of Innovation, was a dynamic and exhilarating event that celebrated the fusion of creativity and technology. It was a two-day competitive event designed to challenge and inspire first-year and second-year students. The event provided a platform for students to showcase their creativity, technical skills, and problem-solving abilities through UI design, frontend development, and algorithm challenges.
